caption.p: Applications of lignin particles at the oil/water interface. (a) Left: Transmission electron microscopy image of colloidal lignin particles obtained by aerosol flow technique. Middle: Modeling and SEM image of lignin particles forming a particulate film upon evaporation. Right: Fluorescent image of oil droplets stabilized by autofluorescent lignin particles.
